header: Few things will improve your sales more than great images. This is particularly true in consumer e-commerce. St. Jane is a premium skincare brand who knows this well.

layout.title: Stunning Product Photos Without a Studio
text: All the images you see here were made with 3D software. Our process provides greater control and saves money. It is often faster than traditional photography â€“ after your initial 3D models are created you can insert them in any environment.

layout.title: Images Better Than Real Life
text: In addition to creating images from scratch, we've also improved St. Janes existing catalog of images. Take a look at this photo from their collection below. Their original picture was okay, but we made it ten times better.

We first worked with St. Jane on product pictures, and now we also do lifestyle images (like the ones on this page). If you're an e-commerce store the need for high quality images never stops. That's why our unlimited design services might be a great fit.

We put the editorial concept in front of users and it proved to be the most popular feature we tested. After getting validation, we designed a CMS that allowed the Francesca's editorial team to regularly update item pairings that worked well together.

In addition to the rebrand, we also made a concerted effort to optimize Francesca's checkout experience. We designed several checkout flows and did user testing to find which one worked best. The two winning designs were later A/B tested by the client to further optimize the site.
